duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform maintenance/preventative maintenance/electrical and millwright-type functions for rotating equipment assembly/disassembly, basic equipment maintenance, rotating equipment alignments, and control panel startups.
Push/pull pumps and motors, install seals/packing, and make recommendations to customers on repair options.
Diagnose and correct basic mechanical issues, advise customers of basic PM activities, and complete required reports for the work completed.
Understand and perform basic LOTO (Lock Out/Tag Out) functions, troubleshoot, and achieve alignments on equipment in unfavorable conditions.
Clean and organize shop and field service vehicles, work with Customer Service, Shop, and Sales, and field calls pertinent to customers and various projects.

education_certification.credential: High School or equivalent, with mechanical aptitude and skills. Bachelor's degree in a related field preferred.
